description.narrative: Establishing the animal feed factory and improving the income of the members by delivering good quality animal feed at reasonable price

The objectives of 2020 AP are as follows:  

  1. Professionalizing the 7 PCs via hiring managers 
  2. Developing the strategic plan for the 7 PCs to ensure the sustainability of PCs professional 
  3. to well understand the plan installation and challenges
  4. Experience sharing on animal feed industries and organizing farmers filed day on Demo Farm
  5. Empowering women in the board members and in controlling committee of the union and PCs

Cher-Cher Oda Bultum Farmers Cooperatives Union started with 62 primary cooperatives in 2005. Its main areas of service are input and output marketing. Currently the Union has 128 primary cooperatives and it is constantly looking for new ways to improve the value to its members. Initiatives are taken around feed concentrate improving the productivity of cows via artificial insemination coffee roasting and dairy processing empowering females to the decision making position and engaging the youth to the cooperatives. Currently 43 576 farmers are connected to the Union. The business case that the union presented to Agriterra for collaboration is dairy business development in which case the Union is planning to improve the income from members' milk production by collecting and processing the milk and selling it in nearby and distant urban markets. However at this moment Agriterra looking the priority project activity with union and focusing on Establishing animal Feed Processing plant before the dairy processing.  Agriterra agreed to work with the union on three stages. The first stage is to work on activities that have direct impacts on individual farmers i.e. animal feed processing plant improving the dairy development activities at the household level through artificial insemination. In the second stage Agriterra strengthen the 17 Primary Cooperatives for 7 PCs hiring the managers through cost-sharing and diversify the services to make them vibrant business organization and for the 10 PCs working on empowering women in decision making position and in the third level strengthen the union digitalizing financial management systems and supporting on unions organizational strengthening via human resource.

Agriterra expected to exit from this union after establishing the animal feed factory and after capacitating the factory is running smoothly in 2023.

participating-org.narrative: Cher cher Oda bultum Farmers Cooperatives Union
